forge.hearth.elements.debug module

Debug shape drawing in Forge without using the render pipeline.

forge.hearth.elements.debug.draw_circle(center: ~forge.core.physics.vector.Vector2D, radius: int = 10, color: ~forge.core.engine.color.Color = Color -> R: 255, G: 80, B: 80, A: 255) → None

Draw a debug circle onto the display directly.

Parameters

  • center (forge.core.physics.vector.Vector2D) – Center of the circle.

  • radius (int) – Radius of the circle; defaults to 10.

  • color (forge.core.engine.color.Color) – Color of the circle; defaults to (R: 255, G: 80, B: 80) - light red.

forge.hearth.elements.debug.draw_line(start: ~forge.core.physics.vector.Vector2D, end: ~forge.core.physics.vector.Vector2D, color: ~forge.core.engine.color.Color = Color -> R: 255, G: 255, B: 255, A: 255, width: int = 3) → None

Draw a line onto the display directly.

Parameters

  • start (forge.core.physics.vector.Vector2D) – Start point of the line.

  • end (forge.core.physics.vector.Vector2D) – End point of the line.

  • color (forge.core.engine.color.Color) – Color of the line; defaults to (R: 255, G: 255, B: 255) - white.

  • width (int) – Width of the line; defaults to 3.

forge.hearth.elements.debug.draw_polygon(vertices: list[forge.core.physics.vector.Vector2D], color: ~forge.core.engine.color.Color = Color -> R: 255, G: 80, B: 80, A: 255, line_width: int = 0) → None

Draw a polygon onto the display directly.

Parameters

  • vertices (list[forge.core.physics.vector.Vector2D]) – List of vertices of the polygon.

  • color (forge.core.engine.color.Color) – Color of the polygon; defaults to (R: 255, G: 80, B: 80) - light red.

  • line_width (int) – Width of the line of the polygon; defaults to 0.

forge.hearth.elements.debug.draw_rectangle(top_left: ~forge.core.physics.vector.Vector2D, width: int, height: int, color: ~forge.core.engine.color.Color = Color -> R: 255, G: 80, B: 80, A: 255, line_width: int = 0) → None

Draw a rectangle onto the display directly.

Parameters

  • top_left (forge.core.physics.vector.Vector2D) – Top-left position of the rectangle.

  • width (int) – Width of the rectangle.

  • height (int) – Height of the rectangle.

  • color (forge.core.engine.color.Color) – Color of the rectangle; defaults to (R: 255, G: 80, B: 80) - light red.

  • line_width (int) – Width of the line of the rectangle; defaults to 0.
